tool_description: This API predicts extremely well whether or not an SMS is a spam or not.
name: Spam SMS detection
title: Spam SMS detection

api_list.name: predictSMS
api_list.description: Enter in the payload the textBody which is the SMS text and it will return for you REAL or SPAM label
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spam-sms-detection.p.rapidapi.com/predictSMS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spam-sms-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spam-sms-detection.p.rapidapi.com/predictSMS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
